languages.text: "Мы смеемся и прославляем жизнь, шерин, как подобает настоящим друзьям. Но до вашего прихода мы были подобны звездам на ночном небе без сияющей луны. Мы лишь предвещали ваше появление. Теперь же мы счастливы".
"We have been laughing and celebrating life, shereen, as true friends do. But until your arrival, we were but stars in a moonless sky, merely heralding your coming. Now we are happy."
languages.original_text: "Мы смеемся и прославляем жизнь, шерин, как подобает настоящим друзьям. Но до вашего прихода мы были подобны звездам на ночном небе без сияющей луны. Мы лишь предвещали ваше появление. Теперь же мы счастливы".

traits.locale_text: "We have been laughing and celebrating life, shereen, as true friends do. But until your arrival, we were but stars in a moonless sky, merely heralding your coming. Now we are happy."
"We have been laughing and celebrating life, shereen, as true friends do. But until your arrival, we were but stars in a moonless sky, merely heralding your coming. Now we are happy."
"We have been laughing and celebrating life, shereen, as true friends do. But until your arrival, we were but stars in a moonless sky, merely heralding your coming. Now we are happy."
"We have been laughing and celebrating life, shereen, as true friends do. But until your arrival, we were but stars in a moonless sky, merely heralding your coming. Now we are happy."

languages.text: “所有人都在欢笑，庆祝生活，就像真正的朋友会做的那些事情一样，亲爱的。你来这里之前，我们不过是天空中孤独的群星，等待着你的到来。而如今，我们都很开心。”
languages.original_text: "We have been laughing and celebrating life, shereen, as true friends do. But until your arrival, we were but stars in a moonless sky, merely heralding your coming. Now we are happy."

traits.locale_text: “所有人都在欢笑，庆祝生活，就像真正的朋友会做的那些事情一样，亲爱的。你来这里之前，我们不过是天空中孤独的群星，等待着你的到来。而如今，我们都很开心。”

languages.text: 「真の友人として、あたしたちは笑い合い、人生を謳歌してきた。でも、あんたが来るまでは、あたしたちは月のない空の星にすぎず、ただあんたの到来を告げていただけだった。今、あたしたちは幸せだよ」
languages.original_text: "We have been laughing and celebrating life, shereen, as true friends do. But until your arrival, we were but stars in a moonless sky, merely heralding your coming. Now we are happy."

traits.locale_text: 「真の友人として、あたしたちは笑い合い、人生を謳歌してきた。でも、あんたが来るまでは、あたしたちは月のない空の星にすぎず、ただあんたの到来を告げていただけだった。今、あたしたちは幸せだよ」

languages.text: «Estábamos riendo y celebrando la vida, shereen, como hacen los amigos de verdad. Pero hasta que ha llegado no éramos más que estrellas en una noche sin luna, meros heraldos de su llegada. Ahora somos verdaderamente felices».
languages.original_text: "We have been laughing and celebrating life, shereen, as true friends do. But until your arrival, we were but stars in a moonless sky, merely heralding your coming. Now we are happy."

traits.locale_text: «Estábamos riendo y celebrando la vida, shereen, como hacen los amigos de verdad. Pero hasta que ha llegado no éramos más que estrellas en una noche sin luna, meros heraldos de su llegada. Ahora somos verdaderamente felices».

languages.text: « On rit et on trinque à la vie, shereen, comme le font les vrais amis. Mais jusqu'à votre arrivée, nous n'étions que des étoiles dans un ciel sans lune, annonçant simplement votre venue. Et maintenant, nous sommes comblés. »
languages.original_text: "We have been laughing and celebrating life, shereen, as true friends do. But until your arrival, we were but stars in a moonless sky, merely heralding your coming. Now we are happy."

traits.locale_text: « On rit et on trinque à la vie, shereen, comme le font les vrais amis. Mais jusqu'à votre arrivée, nous n'étions que des étoiles dans un ciel sans lune, annonçant simplement votre venue. Et maintenant, nous sommes comblés. »

languages.text: "Wir haben gelacht und das Leben gefeiert, Shereen, so wie es echte Freunde tun. Doch bis zu Eurer Ankunft waren wir lediglich Sterne am mondlosen Himmel, die Euer Kommen nur verkündet haben. Jetzt sind wir glücklich."
languages.original_text: "We have been laughing and celebrating life, shereen, as true friends do. But until your arrival, we were but stars in a moonless sky, merely heralding your coming. Now we are happy."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben gelacht und das Leben gefeiert, Shereen, so wie es echte Freunde tun. Doch bis zu Eurer Ankunft waren wir lediglich Sterne am mondlosen Himmel, die Euer Kommen nur verkündet haben. Jetzt sind wir glücklich."

languages.text: "Gülüşüyor ve hayatı kutluyoruz şirinim. Gerçek birer dost gibi. Ancak sen gelene kadar bizler, aydan yoksun bir gökyüzündeki yıldızlardan ibarettik, yalnızca senin gelişinin müjdecileriydik. Artık gerçek anlamda mutlu olduk."
languages.original_text: "We have been laughing and celebrating life, shereen, as true friends do. But until your arrival, we were but stars in a moonless sky, merely heralding your coming. Now we are happy."

traits.locale_text: "Gülüşüyor ve hayatı kutluyoruz şirinim. Gerçek birer dost gibi. Ancak sen gelene kadar bizler yalnızca aydan yoksun bir gökyüzündeki yıldızlardan ibarettik, yalnızca senin gelişinin müjdecileriydik. Artık gerçek anlamda mutlu olduk."
